name: TableCell
description: Represents a cell in a OneNote table.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Gets the ID of the cell.

properties.name: parentRow
properties.description: Gets the parent row of the cell.

properties.name: rowIndex
properties.description: Gets the index of the cell's row in the table.

properties.name: cellIndex
properties.description: Gets the index of the cell in its row.

properties.name: paragraphs
properties.description: Gets the collection of Paragraph objects in the TableCell.

properties.name: shadingColor
properties.description: Gets and sets the shading color of the cell

methods.name: appendHtml
methods.description: Adds the specified HTML to the bottom of the TableCell.

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: The HTML string to append. See [supported HTML](../../docs/onenote/onenote-add-ins-page-content.md#supported-html) for the OneNote add-ins JavaScript API.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the contents of the cell.

methods.name: appendTable
methods.description: Adds a table with the specified number of rows and columns to table cell.
methods.signature: appendTable(rowCount: number, columnCount: number, values: string[][])

parameters.name: rowCount
parameters.description: Required. The number of rows in the table.

parameters.name: columnCount
parameters.description: Required. The number of columns in the table.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: Optional 2D array. Cells are filled if the corresponding strings are specified in the array.

methods.name: appendRichText
methods.description: Adds the specified text to table cell.

methods.name: appendImage
methods.description: Adds the specified image to table cell.
methods.signature: appendImage(base64EncodedImage: string, width: double, height: double)

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Optional. Width in the unit of Points. The default value is null and image width will be respected.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Optional. Height in the unit of Points. The default value is null and image height will be respected.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
